### 2-c. Frequency


```{r echo = F}
library(dplyr)
library(tidytext)

test = IMDB_reviews

movie_words = test %>% unnest_tokens(word, input = review_summary) %>% count(movie_id, word, sort = T)

movie_words

total_words = movie_words %>% group_by(movie_id) %>% summarize(total = sum(n))

movie_words = left_join(book_words, total_words)
movie_words
```
